etymons.meaning: to tell, relate; to say, speak

Preterit.turoyo: mleleqalyūn w bəzle, šteleqalyūn w bəzle w lo=mtanele 414; prs 17/6; prs 18/34; prs 92/4, 12; 6/93; 30/38; 36/15; 43/45; 64/48; 73/79; 79/16; lo=mtanelaedi l-i=səsto. šġīlaʕma Mammo, lo=k-məšġoloprs 3/20; lə-mtanelaaʕme w-la=maqəmla m-i=šanṯo
greʕotwəḷḷeLu+malko lo mtaneleaʕme, lo twəḷḷeʕarzdiḏelo məḷḷelemedeḥarbo, bas u+greʕoġalabenafəlqəmruḥe
translations: ‘he was very much upset’) he did not insult him (p.c. Ilyas 09-05-2022)
